entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Hybrid - Android - Keyboard covers UI despite having resize soft keyboard setting #24573
  • Input component is not getting focused on ChromeOS/Android Desktop when a user clicks on it #24572
  • [Android] `RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand` of `CarouselView` is not triggered #24571
  • [WinUI] `RefreshView` is not functional when wrapping a `CarouselView` #24570
  • MenuBarItem UI is not refreshing based on the IsEnabled property in Mac Catalyst #24569
  • Delayed Update of Navbar Title and TabBar Background Color in .NET MAUI on Android When Switching Tabs #24568
  • Android ecosystem updates for `net9.0-rc2` #24566
    9.0-rc2

Closed

  • White or Black screen navigation on Android #13698
  • WebView on iOS causes UriFormatException: 'Invalid URI: The format of the URI could not be determined' #19161
  • Calendar Icon not shown in android phone. #24483
  • [Binding SG] It is not possible to use private fields and properties in SetBinding<TSource, TProperty> #23535
    9.0-rc2
  • El sdk microsoft.net.sdk especificado no se pudo encontrar #24297

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc.1] Update sdk rc1 #24574
  • [IOS] - Fix error when running new template maui app on iOS #24567
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix for CollectionView single item horizontal alignment issue when using ItemsLayout with a Footer. #24564
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨

Merged

  • Fix "Grey" cannot be used to set Background property #24325
    community ✨
  • [Binding SG] Refactor intercepted method verification #24514
    area-xaml
  • Show number of filtered tests in DeviceTests UI #24549
    area-testing

Updated

  • Navigation memory leak: Appearing event not being unsubscribed properly #24507
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • [testing] Fix CollectionView2 UITests #24471
    area-controls-collectionview, area-testing
  • [Android & iOS] dialog theme change on changing UserAppTheme #24559
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-theme
  • [Android] invalidate shadows on parent's size change #24561
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • BarBackground with Brush in NavigationPage on theme change #24429
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/android
  • [iOS] Shadow for clipped visual element #23872
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix OnBackButtonPressed on iOS (#8296) #14137
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Avoid recomputing bindings multiple times and bind BindingContext first #24553
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix WordWrap not working when Padding is set on Label #16136
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [Windows] - Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #24276
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [X] Ignore Parent DataType on collection #24530
    area-xaml
  • fix ICanvas.ClipPath documentation #24560
    community ✨
  • Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers #24479
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Improve measure invalidation and legacy Layout(s) performance #24532
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Resolved Text Jump Issue in Entry Control with HorizontalTextAlignment Set to End #24485
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Android] Fix for Scrolling of Editor placed in ScollView issue #24531
    community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [X] do not look for parent DataType on collections #24513
    area-xaml
